name: Cailin Clarke
text: Employee Ben was not wearing a mask while giving me my food and shoved my food so hard it almost fell off the counter. Incredibly disappointed in the health and safety standards of this establishment.

name: Andres Mezu
text: This location is Actually close...

name: patricia hadaway
text: I was just in your store at 5 pm on 7/10/20. I order two pizzas and ask for them to be freshly made. I got home to have two tried up pizzas to be sold by 5 pm. Very disappointed. I guess my family will need to take our business else where. â€¦More

name: Nancy Schultz
text: It is what it is! It's cheap, easy, fast, & kids love it! THE ONLY REASON I WENT!

name: Susan Santos-Diaz
text: Not the best. Not enough cheese. Pizza was a little dry, hard and cold. Price is pretty cheap though. I guess you get what you pay for.

name: Colleen Murray
text: We enjoy little Caesars pizza but tonight I was really disappointed.  The large is no longer large. It is now the size of a medium pizza at the same  cost or higher!  A real bummer!!!

name: Tripistries
text: Placed a pickup order, pizza was already made and the guy literally would not give it to me. Ridiculous. Worst little caesars location Iâ€™ve ever been to.

name: Cassie C
text: Great customer service. Better than a 'papa' named place near by. Very happy.

name: Lori Miller
text: Store is clean, never a long wait and for cheap pizza, itâ€™s good! They have a fair selection and itâ€™s AFFORDABLE! Folks really shouldnâ€™t complain at all. Thank you Little Caesarâ€™s

name: Tom Winslow
text: Best pie that l have had in a long time.

name: Timothy Corum
text: My son Dash loves Little Caesars pizza. It is a great price for a meal that he will eat.

name: Thomas Greene
text: Really nice staff with great pizza.

name: Jessica Horney
text: I'm always in and out in a flash, because I usually pick up Hot & Ready pizzas. The cashier is always friendly. The new location is more central and fairly easy to get in and out as long as you turn right. Actually not too hard to get to the light if you need to turn left ðŸ˜Š

name: Margaret MacLeod Blackwell
text: Quick, easy, kind staff

name: NC
text:
Love the Hot & Ready ! No wait times!
And the pizza and bread sticks were hot!

name: Tim Cole
text: Great pizza and incredible customer service! Plus, there very fast with carry out.

name: Linda Key
text: Great deal when you need to feed a large group.

name: Judith Smith
text: Good but they are not at this location anymore

name: Roseann Richardson
text: Very good and fast.

name: James White
text: Good price for pizza, moved next to five guys burgers

name: William Ward
text: Lil ceasers is getting better!

name: Amish Schulze
text: I have never had a bad pizza from Little Caesars. I always go with that square Detroit sound and it is delicious. Plus, you can't go wrong with the price.

name: Bridget Hambrook
text: Can we talk about how cheap this pizza is?I like so happy about that. But not the greatest pizza in the world. But can't complain.

name: Jennifer Brown
text: Cheap and good

name: Teresa Pennington
text: Not worth the 22.90..spend more and go to mellow mushroom...

name: Kenny Owensby
text: Gotta love eating cardboard pizza.

name: George arnette
text: Fast and good. Very friendly people. I only have one complaint MORE CHEESE PLEASE LOL.

name: Betty Boop
text: Face Service and clean store, the only bad thing was I found a hair on my pizza though

name: Jake sandry
text: DELICIOUS Veggie Pizza! Super quick order!

name: ron forster
text: Great lunch  specials

name: Amy Barker
text: Not bad for a $5 Pizza I'm not a fan of pizza but this place is very clean great staff

name: Harley Mcmillan
text: Poor customer service. Employee walked out with a deep dish pizza after coming in after me not in uniform and I had to wait 25 minutes

name: Heather Sanders
text: Good pizza

name: TL Rachelle
text: Can't beat the pick up portal and prices! Get the app!!!

name: Eddie Poff
text: Went well

name: Anita Holland
text: Delicious pizza!

name: Gabriela Miranda
text: Yummy

text: Great

text: Is what it is

text: Always love Pizza!
